original_text: As for you, the anointing you received from him remains in you, and you do not need anyone to teach you. But as his anointing teaches you about all things and as that anointing is real, not counterfeit—just as it has taught you, remain in him.
korean_text: 너희는 주께 받은 바 기름 부음이 너희 안에 거하나니 아무도 너희를 가르칠 필요가 없고 오직 그의 기름 부음이 모든 것을 너희에게 가르치며 또 참되고 거짓이 없으니 너희를 가르치신 그대로 주 안에 거하라

sentences.original_text: the anointing you received from him
and you do not need anyone to teach you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 누가 가르쳐 줄 필요가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: But as his anointing teaches you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 기름부음이 너희를 가르치는 대로

sentences.original_text: and as that anointing is real
just as it has taught you
